pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Functions for the Maxwell-Boltzmann-Bose-Einstein- Fermi-Dirac (MBBEFD) Family of Distributions // Provides probability mass, distribution, quantile, random variate generation, and method-of-moments parameter fitting for the MBBEFD family of distributions used in insurance modeling as described in Bernegger (1997) doi:10.2143/AST.27.1.563208 without any external dependencies.
